main event: A bright white light was observed moving erratically in the sky near Little Rock, Arkansas.
interesting points: The sighting took place on 18 July 1966 at 0230 hours., The object blinked and showed a dim yellow light before disappearing behind trees., The object's movement included slow travel toward the southeast and increasing speed., The initial conclusion was that it might be an airplane, but its unusual maneuvers led to uncertainty., An earlier report from 16 August 1965 described a similar sight and was evaluated as a satellite.
sighted object: a bright white light that blinked and showed a dim yellow light
witness description: The observer described movements and lights of the object.
